title: Ep177: Just Pay For It Feat Tahoe and Orlando Roye
itunes:title: Ep177: Just Pay For It Feat Tahoe and Orlando Roye
description:
This week the duo is joined in studio with the hosts of the Hard or Soft Podcast Tahoe and Orlando and they get into men opening up about sexual conversations and more. The Wayfair and child sex trafficking conspiracy is discussed among the crew before Tahoe shares a sex tip in bed and Mandii lends her own sex tip to achieving depth in the puss and successfully doing the Amazon position. Nothing wrong with paying for it. Orlando shares his experience as a man on Onlyfans and how he chooses to charge people to watch him use sex toys then for the Heaux Confession, Tahoe shares his most recent experience with paying two women to dominate his partner. The details are steamy! Be sure to check out Hard or Soft Podcast wherever you listen to your favorite podcasts and follow them on social media @tahoetv @dearorlandoroye This week's episode is sponsored by Adam & eve. Get 50% off almost any one item at adamandeve.com using Promocode: WD50 Join in on the conversation! Follow us on Twitter @whoreiblepod and use #whoreibledecisions when discussing the show and also follow us on Instagram @whoreible_decisions and hosts Mandii @fullcourtpumps @weezywtf All caught up? There are over 70 bonus episodes waiting for you at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions Support the show and become a Patron today!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
